name: Frick Frack (itch)
description:
Synopsis:

Just as you were about to lose all hope, you’ve found a job. It’s not exactly what you dreamed, but it pays the bills. You begin work and quickly learn the consequences of your actions.

Frick Frack is a puzzle simulation game about hurting what you love the most. You must find the perfect work-life balance but the work you do directly affects
the world around you. Good luck.

Controls:

  • Movement:                                                                   WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Fire:                                                                                   Space

Credits:

  • Weston Bell-Geddes
    • Director, designer, developer, engineer
  • Erica Wang
    • Artist
  • Sheehan Ahmed
    • Engineer
  • Doug Walters
    • Sound designer, composer

Website | Play on  Steam with achievements!
